website_summaries.verdict: A safe and simple nail dryer at a price that's difficult to match.
pros: Four time settings with automatic shut-off
cons: Small size makes it difficult to do all five fingers at once

customer_reviews.title: Bought this lamp and have used it about 5 times with great success. Nails looked awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bummed out. Bought this lamp and have used it about 5 times with great success. Nails looked awesome, lasted long. The lamp showed no sign of any issues and yesterday when I plugged it in to use, the lamp would not turn on. UPDATE: The company reached out and sent a new lamp, free of charge. So far so good with them new lamp! Thank you KEDSUM :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I typically pay over $50 at a salon to get gel nails. I was a little skeptic that this lamp would not work as well as the ones in the salon does, but I used it over a week ago and my nails still look professionally done. I'm very glad I bought this product. I don't think I'm ever going back to the salon again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Update on FANTASTIC SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The light is not strong enough. I have to do several cycles to harden my acrylic nails and designs. Update: I was so surprised to receive an Email from the seller stating that they refunded me my money. Yes, I did check my bank account and the refund was there. This is why I changed my 3 stars to 5 stars. The seller went out of his/her way to make me a happy and humble customer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and compact and fits my hand right underneath so ...
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with some UV nail polish that I had and used the 90sec option and my nails were dried right after. This light comes with three different time settings (10,30, 60, 300)and it also has a simple meter to let you know when to recharge it. It is nice and compact and fits my hand right underneath so it is still useful. it cable so everything you need to get started is right in the box too. More at home manicures from now on!
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: doesn't dry well
customer_reviews.text: takes while to dry and doesn't work very well. i used multiple times the first few months I purchased and at this time its just sitting with my nail stuff. when I do paint I rarely take the time to pull it out since it doesn't work as quick as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Morales

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really work well. I tried different nail polishes multiple times to see if they would dry and after using the lamp for more than 15 mins my nails were not dry and I had to take all my nail polish off. It seemed as if they air dried faster then when I used the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: atazer1960

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This simple LED Lamp really does the trick. I recommend it to anyone looking to do at home gel manicures. My favorite part is that you can fit 4 fingers at a time witch makes the process go much faster then some of those single finger lamps available for just a few bucks cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Psyopsgaming.tv

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This does work, I just found that for my gel polishes that say it takes 30 seconds under the LED light, that really it works better with the minute setting. It goes off automatically and the timer is easy. You can't go wrong with this! Great for beginner gel people (like myself)
customer_reviews.author: Leria DravenTop Contributor: Beauty and the Beast

customer_reviews.title: Good, as far as it goes
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the lamp or the nail polish, but the gel began to peel off the very next day. In defense of the Kedsum, it is light, easy to use, has good controls, and I'm happy with the product. But I might not be using it anymore if I can't find a moderately priced polish that actually stays on. So, until I try some alternatives, I can't tell where the problem lies.
customer_reviews.author: T.P.

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Small and lightweight but does the job incredibly well. This was my very first time doing gel nails and I was positive I wasn't going to do it right. But it was super easy! And like everybody says, do your four fingers at the same time and then do your thumbs together.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wornom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light, cures the Polish FAST without much heat. Best purchase if you're doing gel polish at home. Big enough to do fingers or toes. Do thumbs seperate FIRST, makes it easier to get those out of the way so you can perfectly polish the rest. Very happy with my purchase, brought it on a family trip and did everyone's nails <3 5 stars, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first light, and now serves as my back up (in case my pricier one with more features fails me). This worked great though, time and again. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, works perfect. I use the 30s setting on the first coat, then I put acetone, and then another coat of the nail polish, 30 seconds in the lamp, acetone and they are ready. Could compare with salon manicure, plus they are easy to remove. I didn't like how it works with sally hansen's gel nail polishes they got kind of sticky. Very easy to use, Ifinish my hand and toes in less than 15 minutes. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: minerva bermudez

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Takes about 180secs to dry though. Not deep enough for all 5 fingers. So just have to dry thumb separate but no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This works great so far
customer_reviews.text: *Update* This seller contacted me to apologize for the discrepancy in the description. I still think it works great and I would recommend it. This works great so far. My only complaint is that it says that the timer is for 10/30/60 seconds or 3 minutes, but instead of 3 minutes it's actually 300 seconds (5 minutes is too long).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nails in half the time
customer_reviews.text: Had the small one before where I could only do one nail at a time. At four coats, super time consuming. This works amazingly well. Ability to adjust the time. Pretty nails in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This LED lamp rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp a couple of times a week. Absolute love it! I love that it's LED, not sunlight. Sometimes with the fingers underneath, inside the lamp, I can really feel the heat! I'm glad that it's not sunlight, because I really don't want any possibility to sun damage or skin cancer of the fingers! This was very reasonably priced also
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough. I had to use it on the longest setting 4-5 times to get my polish to set.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to cure my gel nails. My only complaint is that it is fairly small and easy to bump your wet nails on the sides/back.
customer_reviews.author: Stef B

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my gel polish! I was initially freaking out thinking my polish never cured because it was so sticky when I was done (like glue)... After searching the web, they're supposed to be! Use alcohol wipes and they're perfect! I just assumed they'd only be a bit sticky not seem like wet polish still! Manicure done in 25 mins (not bad for my first time!)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I was looking for. I cure my gel manicures on the 60 second setting. They last any where from 1-2 weeks, depending on how well I do at keeping the polish off of my skin when polishing
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: this lamp really does a great job of setting the gel polish
customer_reviews.text: while the low price made me suspicious, this lamp really does a great job of setting the gel polish. its small size also allows for it to be stored really easily. I use this for all of my manicures and have to say I've been really happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Winn

customer_reviews.title: Im pretty sure a lot of the problems come from human ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this specific lamp after my friend gave me a gel mani with hers. Its no frills and straight forward with multiple timer options. Im pretty sure a lot of the problems come from human error (my not prepping the nails properly, or using a low quality polish, or not knowing how long to cure a specific brand of polish).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Welch

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! at the beginning, but as I've been using it it burns my fingers and is horrible. Be careful! UPDATE: After my review the seller contacted me and stuff everything in his power to make it right. They refunded my money and said they contacted the manufacturer to make them aware of this issues. So good customer service, bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I only use the 60 second with my uv polish. Works just like I'm in the nail salon but without the bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Yeksimal

customer_reviews.title: Great little light!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast! Light works great. It's a little small and I can't get my fingers and thumb in, but that's my fault for not checking the size before purchasing. Dries my nails quick and works like a dream. Nails come out looking fantastic every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lizmab20

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It works great. After you cure each coat you must rub your nails with alcohol after the base coat the color coats and the top coat so that it won't be sticky.
customer_reviews.author: sara a.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp Lamp Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly smaller than I thought it would be. I haven't tested it out yet since my gel polishes are coming today (12:22am right now). I'll update once I've tried it out, i can already tell that the automated timers are a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing. It cut down the curing time insanely low
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time, and it was perfectly packaged. I was using a UV lamp and I will never go back. This lamp might be a little small but it js still worth it. It's amazing. It cut down the curing time insanely low. I'm so impressed with this lamp. I would definitely recommend this and buy more products from KEDSUM.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Really like the small profile of this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like the small profile of this product. It will make it alot easier to use and not have to bring out the big one. Thanks for your product.
customer_reviews.author: my toy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I didn't realize how small it was before I purchased it but I actually like the fact that it was so compact. I also received it two days after i ordered it. I have to buy more gel polishes but I bought some chrome powder and plan to use it with that. I had ordered a lamp awhile ago of a different brand and had to return it because the lamps didnt work at all but this one is doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: This LED lamp works great (60 seconds each coat
customer_reviews.text: This LED lamp works great (60 seconds each coat, plus an extra 60 seconds for last coat). However, the lamp is a little short for my hand so I have to arch my hand to get all five fingers inside the dome. Not a big deal. I would recommend this project - it's inexpensive and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ferchaud

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My self done gel manicure is just as good as one I would get done in a salon!! Used it along with the Sally Hansen Gel set. So happy I will be saving myself money with the same quality! Very light and compact easy to store away! My friend borrowed right away and loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya A

customer_reviews.title: Great! One small flaw
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great purchase. My one big complaint is that I wish this had a "bottom" to it. I like to do my nails in bed or sitting on the couch, and I found that I had to find a binder/clipboard or something else hard to place under it so I could do them well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Nodjak

customer_reviews.title: Increase curing time because of lower wattage
customer_reviews.text: This light works great. My gel polish instructions are for a 36 watt lamp and this one is a 12 watt. If my polish says cure for 20 seconds, I times by 3 and cure for 60 seconds since since 12 is 1/3 of 36. I'm not sure if it's really necessary to cure that long, but I do just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well for the price. Have to use it about a minute longer than the salon but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small, it took too long to dry, I think it will be ok for small hands people.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona H

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just leave on for an extra few minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just leave on for an extra few minutes to make sure nails get ultra dry. Powerful finishing touch to nails
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This light is easy to use and has 3 settings for the best drying times. It was shipped fast and great follow up with the seller. The only thing I don't like is I cannot fit my thumb in to dry at the same time as my fingers. Otherwise it's a great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about 6 months now and it works great! Just bought another one for my mom. Definitely great product for an affordable price! Highly recommend this Nail Lamp
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected and takes many times to dry the polish even after spending $8.00 dollars on led polish. Wish I had just bought a regular nail dryer.
customer_reviews.author: A.B Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & goodbye salon!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased! This Worked just as described. I had no issues and my nails are salon quality. I defiantly recommend this. I bought the gelish nail kit and polish and used the 30 sec timer each step and it was perfect. I could just manage to fit my entire hand inside (larger hand may have to do thumbs seperatly) and it fit over my toes just fine as well. I would buy again or as a gift defiantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Small but works better than my useless more expensive one!
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: I bought this lamp to get me introduced to the soak off led gel polish game and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for a little over a week now and I'm loving it. It works very well and it is so simple to use. I bought this lamp to get me introduced to the soak off led gel polish game and I'm very happy with my purchase. I've compared prices at the beauty stores and this seems like a very good deal considering the power of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: R0ssita

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I will never go back to a nail salon again. I will be doing my own from now thanks to this lamp. My nails have turned out beautiful. It took a couple times to get the technique down. The purchase was worth it. The
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: Product works nicely! My criticism is the size. It would be nice to fit my whole hand in the lamp for curing (would save time too) but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It works good, and the price was low, so it's a good value for the price. I just wish I would've gotten a higher wattage lamp to cure the gel faster.
customer_reviews.author: SamiD423

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing your nails at home
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving being able to do gel nails at home. This is a good LED lamp which quickly seals the polish. My hands are a little larger so I have to angle them to get all fingers on. My daughter does not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work and it also looked like it had been used prior to being delivered.
customer_reviews.author: K Mason

customer_reviews.title: A taaaad bit too small.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Does the job. My only complaint is that it's a tad bit too small. I struggle to get the corner of my thumb sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Kikdavs

customer_reviews.title: Super good.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I specifically love the 4 time setting on it. It’s very practical.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nails
customer_reviews.text: Love doing my own gel nails and and works perfect to dry
customer_reviews.author: Ajola

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the size and price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, small so easy to store, would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Xanders

customer_reviews.title: does what its supposed to. i always run it ...
customer_reviews.text: does what its supposed to. i always run it twice just to make sure my polish is really cured. never had a problem with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time doing gel nails at home, but it was surprisingly easy and this product worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: hlee7

customer_reviews.title: Great at home salon look with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I love it because it's so compact and the settings are perfect. Works just like the salon and now that I have this I will be able to save money going to the salon. I get the same look right at home!
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Have owner for over a year no problems and works great.
customer_reviews.author: L.Alfo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. So glad I got this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. So glad I got this lamp. It works well....just small. Can only fit 4 fingers. So I do my thumbs separately. I like that you have timer options! Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the company's responsiveness to correcting the problem that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the company's responsiveness to correcting the problem that I had with this item. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leahk97

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Price didn't compromise quality. And i fit all 5 fingers in (standard size hands for a woman).
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne1007

customer_reviews.title: This LED light is great! Works just as it says and is way ...
customer_reviews.text: This LED light is great! Works just as it says and is way faster than my UV light. It is super small and light weight which makes it easy to take with me to do my friends nails. Easy to use and I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: shelby c hall

customer_reviews.title: this is great. I was fearful my nails wouldn't set with ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great. I was fearful my nails wouldn't set with the 60 second timer, they're working great. It's so small and compact which is a plus for me. You can fit 4 fingers at a time and your thumbs together separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This this is amazing! I'm about to buy a second one soon. It works perfectly for Gel products. It helps for regular nail polish as well. If you have patience it's better than using a fan or letting the regular polish air dry prior to applying a gel top coat. And the timer settings are perfect. However I do wish they had one with the option to set customizable timings.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya O.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took to long to cure. Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice and great both times. Nails lasted over two weeks and very happy I cam do them myself at home now. Great purchase/investment!
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Works just like a salon
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It's small and easy to store with my nail supplies. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: This lamp works great! I honestly recommend this led lamp to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp works great! I honestly recommend this led lamp to anyone who would rather do their nails at home then spend outrageous amounts of money on something they can do themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition. Used it only twice so far and havent had any problems. I only use the 60s setting and it cures just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price. If you have unusually ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price. If you have unusually large hands, I don't think this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shinkan

customer_reviews.title: Takes the longest setting (300s) to dry my nails completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes the longest setting (300s) to dry my nails completely. Makes my nails last an extra day or two of the usual 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses. It's been stuck, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two uses. It's been stuck, it won't stop blinking and it never turns off. I think I may have been sent a defective one... **UPDATE** Very great customer service, I was sent a new one as soon as I posted this. It's even better that they sent it sooner than they said they would. Which was 5-8 days, but actually came in about 3. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Can only put in fingers or thumb but I expected that. It takes care of my nails just fine and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthia C. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have to do two or three rounds to dry polish completely....but it does work well
customer_reviews.author: F Davis

customer_reviews.title: great compact dryer, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I do have a hard time fitting all 5 fingers since the light is not very deep but it dries so quick it doesn't matter. I use gelish polish and the dry times on the bottle work perfectly. For those who have trouble with this light, make sure you are using gel polish and layering coats properly. Base, color, top, followed by alcohol cleaning to remove the tacky top layer.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan Ells

customer_reviews.title: It takes long to dry
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use as it take too long to dry
customer_reviews.author: Madir

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Dries each layer in 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Dries each layer in 30 seconds! I was worried it wasnt going to be as good as my friend's Gelish brand that I borrowed, but it works just as good!!
customer_reviews.author: kikis556

customer_reviews.title: Bring it home!
customer_reviews.text: Made well and the whole thing doesn't get too hot for gel and all polishes. Just like the salon...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and compact
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. It arrived quickly. I am able to put it in my luggage. The size is perfect. I would recommend the purchase of this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Yvone Harris

customer_reviews.title: just a little under powered
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but would suggest one with maybe a little more wattage. This one takes my daughter about 5 minutes to cure her nails.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, used it at home doing my own gel Mani.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problems with it. It is easier if you do your thumb separate from your other fingers, but I like now compact it is so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can't fit your whole hand under it without knocking your nails on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It has four time options and just one button, so there's no hassle, no counting the seconds, and it works super efficiently. I previously used just a UV lamp and it would take what seemed like forever for my nails to cure compared to this, since it literally takes seconds. Works like a charm, it's small, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap but works
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in time and arrived in excellent condition. I needed this for my OPI nail polish.I didn't want to spend too much. So I gave this a try and it works wonders. Just like if you were in the salon! Very much appreciate the pre-set 10 second, 30 second,60 second & 300 second push button timers. It actually very strong for such a little product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but works great!!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected..if you have long nails you have to cure your thumbs separate..but works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chestina Terry

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far just a little small so you have to turn your hand at different angles or do fingers on half of each hand separate
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected, but there's no reason to have a bigger one. I love this lamp ... best one I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Haines

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived shortly after ordering and it works great. I love having the 4 timing options.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Nimmo-england

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use Madam Glam gel polishes and this Lamp cures lighter colors in 30secs and darker colors in 60sec. You have to cure each coat. It works perfectly for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this buy and at a great price too
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this buy and at a great price too! I wasn't sure it was actually going to work like the ones at the salon, but it really does! I did 60s twice just to be sure. I am perfectly fine taking the time under the light if that means they'll be dry instantly and a beautiful look like the salon. It was everything I'd hoped it'd be definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunno921

customer_reviews.title: I use it several times a week and it is holding up great. Super buy
customer_reviews.text: This little gem works fabulously. After I do my finger nails I use it to do my toes. I use it several times a week and it is holding up great. Super buy, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RizenPhonenix

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this product. When I received it I plugged it in and it worked.A week later I went to use it and nothing it wouldn't even turn on.Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice for a beginner friendly girl like myself or If you are doing some traveling. It's a 12 wattage with a 10,30,60, and 300 timer. The only thing that bothers me is the 300 and 10 second timers. I feel they are obsolete I would instead like to have had a 90 second timer. You will not be able to fit all five fingers in, but at least it's a space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Tina may

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Big enough for hands and feet. Several timed settings. Great light.
customer_reviews.author: @Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I must be using it wrong...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had too thick a coat of polish on but I tried it twice on 300 sec and still didn't harden
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for starters
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh it works but it feels cheap so you get what you pay for because it does do the job
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works well with OPI gel
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use lamp that cures my OPI gel base, polish, and top coat with ease. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job it's supposed to. I've looked at other LED nail lamps and they were all over $40. My cousin got this exact one so I decided to give it a try. I really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Id like to preface that I am very petite with small ...
customer_reviews.text: Id like to preface that I am very petite with small hands....With this device, I can barely fit my hand inside. Very easy to smudge polish because of crowding.
customer_reviews.author: charlene russo

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It really does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It really does the job! I wish it was bigger as you can only fit 4 fingers and then must do your thumb separately which takes a little while, but you can always buy 2 considering how cheap they are!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
